title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Red car driving slowly in the rain on a city street with tall buildings.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a rainy day on a city street with tall buildings. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The road is wet and there are traffic lights at the intersection. The weather is rainy and visibility is low.
reasoning: The red car is driving slowly because of the rainy weather conditions. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules. The car is approaching an intersection and is about to stop. The driver is paying attention to the traffic lights and other vehicles on the road to ensure safe driving. The rainy weather can make driving more challenging and the driver needs to be extra careful to avoid any accidents.
